CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 25, 1953, reads: "'Spirit of Cotton' - Rose V. Murray of Houston, Tex., the 1953 'Spirit of Cotton Makers Jubilee,' has been captivating audiences throughout the extensive tour, which has taken her and her chaperone, Mrs. R. Q. Venson of Memphis, Tenn., to a dozen states. Last week they were in Pittsburgh, Pa., where the local Links, Inc., presented her as the star in 'Cotton on Parade,' a musicale and fashion show combined. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Full length portrait of Rose V. Murray, "Spirit of Cotton" recipient, wearing light colored strapless evening gown with sequined detailing on top portion, with dark dot patterned shawl draped over left shoulder, posed in front of light colored wall, in interior with rug
